about_the_game:
Your 3D Media Production Simulator
CineSim offers an immersive 3D environment that allows you explore the world of media production. Want to practice lighting a scene, designing a set, or framing the perfect shot? With CineSim, you can do all that and more! Whether you're new to media production or looking to enhance your skills, CineSim provides an intuitive, hands-on platform where you can dive into the world of filmmaking.

Create your own cinematic scenes or explore pre-set templates. CineSim allows you to practice real-world production techniques, all within a stunningly realistic environment powered by Unreal Engine 5—right from your desktop.

  • Easy-to-navigate design for users of all skill levels.

  • Drag-and-drop functionality for quick scene creation.

  • High-quality 3D visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5.

  • Real-time previews to instantly view changes.

  • Two pre-set templates: Western Town and Hong Kong Street.

  • Build custom scenes using the "Blank" template.

  • Access 255+ assets, including characters, props, and environments.

  • Customize characters with various facial expressions and actions.

  • Full control over camera angles, lens types, and focal lengths.

  • Preview and adjust camera settings in real-time.

  • Advanced lighting control for angles and color temperatures.

  • Capture high-quality images of your scenes to showcase your work.

Full Version Upgrade Coming Soon: Unlock a complete cinematic experience with advanced tools, more assets, and full creative control!

  • Access over 2,000 assets, including characters, props, facial expressions, and environments.

  • Unlock all pre-set templates.

  • Epic Mode available.

  • Timeline feature enabled.

  • Full weather control for time of day, sun rotation, and fog density.

  • Custom Control Rig for characters.

Need help or have feedback? 

  • Visit our website for comprehensive tutorials at .

  • Email us directly.

  • Join the discussion on our Steam forum.
